title: Want to remove video from page when it is finished playing.

cells.data:
Havenâ€™t tried it yet but have found the following possible answers.
The idea being to put a video banner on the top of the site, but when finished, replace it with a static image.

First answer:
You can add an event listener with 'ended' as first param:

<video src="video.ogv" id="myVideo">
  video not supported
</video>

<script type='text/javascript'>
    document.getElementById('myVideo').addEventListener('ended',myHandler,false);
    function myHandler(e) {
        // What you want to do after the event
    }
</script>
Basically the same below with slightly different format:

<video src="video.ogv">
     video not supported
</video>

<script>
    var video = document.getElementsByTagName('video')[0];

    video.onended = function(e) {
      /*Do things here!*/
    };
</script>
